title: Microsoft Corp (MSFT) Stock Is Up 2.62% This Week: Buy, Hold, or Sell?
text:
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock is up 55.34% over the last 12 months, and the average rating from Wall Street analysts is a Strong Buy. InvestorsObserver’s proprietary ranking system, gives MSFT stock a score of  73 out of a possible 100. 





That rank is primarily influenced by a long-term technical score of 87. MSFT's rank also includes a short-term technical score of 86. 






 MSFT has an Overall Score of 73. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on MSFT!
See Full MSFT Report


What's Happening with MSFT Stock Today
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock is up 0.07% while the S&P 500 is down -0.03% as of 11:01 AM on Thursday, Feb 8. MSFT is up $0.30 from the previous closing price of $414.05 on volume of 6,573,731 shares. Over the past year the S&P 500 has risen 21.27% while MSFT is up 55.34%. MSFT earned $11.06 a per share in the over the last 12 months, giving it a price-to-earnings ratio of 37.48.
